--- pipe_from_select_all.sql
FROM Singers
|> SELECT ALL *
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Query{
    With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
    Query: &ast.FromQuery{
      From: &ast.From{
        From:   0,
        Source: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 5,
            NameEnd: 12,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
          Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    OrderBy:       (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:         (*ast.Limit)(nil),
    PipeOperators: []ast.PipeOperator{
      &ast.PipeSelect{
        Pipe:          13,
        AllOrDistinct: "ALL",
        As:            nil,
        Results:       []ast.SelectItem{
          &ast.Star{
            Star: 27,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
FROM Singers |> SELECT ALL *
